sense.def: Alternative Writing 癍瘡 , macule-illness sores.

Pathological Condition identical with dou chuang 痘瘡 , smallpox sores. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 3 quotes Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 : 比 歲有病天行發斑瘡，頭面及身須臾周匝，狀如火瘡，皆戴白漿，隨決隨 生，不即療，劇者數日必死 , “Near the age of 1 year, [the child] suffered from heaven-sent macule sores . Head, face and the entire body were all covered in no time. It looked like fire sores. They all contained thick white fluid. Where [a sore] burst open, another one grew. There was no way to cure this. In severe cases death is inevitable within a few days”.
